```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import altair as alt

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df):
    head_of_df = df.head()
    histogram_plot = alt.Chart(df).mark_bar().encode( alt.X('Random Numbers', bin=alt.Bin(maxbins=30)), y='count()' )
    return [head_of_df, histogram_plot]

result = preview_data(data)

print(result[0])
result[1].display()
```
